columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the performing organization. The phone number might be a part of the organizations name as labs might send it as a part of the name.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_DIRECTOR
columns.description: The name of the medical director of the performing organization.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_CITY
columns.description: The city where the performing organization is located.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state where the performing organization is located.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_ZIP_CODE
columns.description: The zip code of the performing organization.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: Phone number of the performing organization.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_CLIA_NUM
columns.description: The Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) number of the performing organization. Any laboratory that is included in the CLIA legislation must obtain a CLIA certificate from the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services. The certificate will include a 10-digit number which is the CLIA number of that laboratory.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_FORMAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item represents the format in which the performing organization medical director name is stored.

columns.name: PERFORMING_ORG_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The housing number of the performing organization address.
